verbs.description: [ARG1: six kids] dead [V: dozen] [ARG2: more ill] after viral outbreak at n j long - term care facility a deadly viral outbreak at a new jersey long - term care facility killed six child patients and infected another dozen kids the state health department said tuesday the lethal adenovirus struck at the wanaque center for nursing and rehabiliation hitting hardest against the kids housed inside the rehabiliation n j wanaque center for nursing nj
